Description: Apply Today | Free Rent on select 2 Bedroom apartment homes when you move-in this month. Expires Oct 5th. Set amid 2 lakes, shade trees and landscaped grounds in Beltsville, MD, Lighthouse at Twin Lakes is a high-rise, garden-style apartment community that boasts gorgeous views in a peaceful setting while being close to everything! Come home to newly remodeled studio, one, two and three bedroom apartments featuring new designer like touches in the kitchens and baths, as well as new washers and dryers. Our location is ideal for those who like to move! Conveniently situated in a wooded, waterside urban neighborhood with easy access to I-95, the Beltway, the ICC, Ft Meade, Verizon, University of Maryland, the historic district of Laurel, and many others. With over 22-floor plan styles, a gorgeous clubhouse, huge pool, playground and bark park, we have a home perfect for your needs! Come visit and discover why Lighthouse at Twin Lakes is the perfect place to call home.
